column3:
‚ÄúFar and away THE BEST strain ever for sex. Extremely similar head space and tactile sensations to LSD. Amplifies your sense of touch exponentially making it perfect for sex, massages, spas, etc. Immense feelings of empathetic connectivity allows allows you to enjoy giving as much as receiving - which, is no small benefit!

Absolutely ZERO anxiety in any situation. Capable...with juuuust the right amount of clarity to...‚Äù

‚ÄúI chose Kry because of the higher CBD level. Had two small puffs off my pipe after work in the evening hours and felt uplifting, talkative effects immediately. I was fairly tired and having pain from Fibromyalgia. I wanted to smoke more because the sweet pine flavor was so nice, but limited myself to see what effects would be. The moderate pain relief came on at about 20- 30 minutes for me and although I felt very ta...‚Äù

‚ÄúBest weed Iv ever had this Grape kryptonite is amazing  helps relax you without  having that indica couch lock! after a long day this weed gives me a very mellow feeling with no worries  at all definitely  hands down the vest weed Iv ever had  and not because  it gets you super high!  But because  of the quality  of the high!  Also it's a good show off"  weed awesome colors and smell! Just a 5 star flower‚Äù"

‚ÄúI have tried many strains for my severe anxiety and depression. After getting tired of shrinks putting me on alot of different meds., I felt like I was in a viscous circle.  Krypto is so incredible for me, it takes such a weight off my shoulders and pushes all the black clouds away. I also have cervix dysplasia and it helps with that pain as well. The Krypto makes me feel pain free, uplifted, and dare I say silly and...‚Äù
‚ÄúIt turned me into the tallest tree in the forest where owls mated upon my limbs.‚Äù

‚ÄúKryptonite is the best strain ever created in my opinion. It does everything. Ther name says it all but the thing is it can fell sativa like in the beginning of the stone and then moves toward indica. The O.G." VERSION IS JUST AS NICE BUT SLIGHTLY HEAVIER. Very dense and sticky. If I see it and it's legit.....I'M GETTING IT.‚Äù"

‚Äú50/50 sweet/fruity & earthy flavor and scent. It's slightly dank in that it forces it's way up your nose on it's terms. Tastes as it smells, good. Looks dark green & dark purple/black with some orange hairs and a lot of trichromes. Not so dense as an indica but spacey and dense like an og kush or sour diesel. Long heavy high. Head is heavy and muscles are relaxed like a bobble head. My back pain is gone. No pills, Dr...‚Äù

Real calming weed
 very tasty‚Äù

‚Äúpicked up at Minerva in Albuquerque NM for $10 a gram. tested at 22.02%thc and .3%cbd. very nice looking budz, with nice darker orange hairs and was medium greenness with pieces of purple calyxes here and there. I can rate the taste or smell due to a little common cold I've got. very nice cerebral high and very relaxing body high. reminds me of a good grown master Kush. did not make me to tired either. very good anyt...‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is one of my favorite Indica strains that I've tried so far! left both myself, and my brother in a cery happy, uplifted state. Laighing uncontrollably at some late night stand-up and eating all the chips and cereal in the house. Very good strain for the heavier stoners :-)‚Äù

‚ÄúThis smoke is easily the most comfortable smoke I have had.  I feel as though i have retreated fully from my body and up into my head, the normal pains or aches I have melt away and leave you sitting in a contemplative peace.‚Äù

Well, I was reproductive, LOL.  It's a great strain for making out,  and wanna get touchy-feely.  Be careful when you lay down with your partner, though - it can put you to sleep if you get heavy-handed with it, and then there won't ...‚Äù
‚ÄúI had a Grape" Kryptonite
column4: pretty amazing stuff.  Smelled of grapes
column6: but it had the scent - looked a bit purple too.  It had a slightly sweet aftertaste
column7: like grape tea if it existed.  This Kryptonite made me fairly sleepy
column8: although I could fight the sleep
column9: I just didn't want to.  I was so chill and mellow
column10: I wanted to just let it happen.  Worked for my muscle pain

column3: ‚ÄúNormally I'm a smoker, but I've been dealing with pneumonia and a broken rib, so I've been vaporizing Kryptonite the last day....and praise Cheebus, I am pain free and it's easier to breath. And to claim pain-free after this hell is no easy feat. Five fucking stars üëèüñí‚Äù

‚ÄúVery nice creeper high... at first you don't really even get that initial buzz (i have a high tolerance, so i can only speak for myself) but after about 5 minutes or so it starts to kick in for me. at first i almost thought it wasnt even doing anything, but i waited it out... 1/4 gram-bowl bong hit is what i took. after about 20 minutes it was hitting very hard. even though it has an average thc level (16.2%) it hits...‚Äù
‚ÄúIt takes like two bows to get a high off of this with the stuff I got at this spot. It kinda makes me think about thoughts deep as I would with mushies but it's an okay high‚Äù

‚ÄúWas very popular where I lived in 90‚Äôs. It has such a wonderful fruity taste and it really helps relax. Its refreshing. We always called it Krypto or Kryppie buds. Very sticky buds with bright red hairs. Sometimes it was called red hair krypto. I haven‚Äôt seen or smoked it in over 20 years. I look forward to finding it again one day but in concentrate form.‚Äù

‚ÄúGreat strain. Acquired from a trusted source in the city. Very potent with a heavy kush taste to it. Delivers a focused but lazy high. I'd advise against leaving your home with this strain; it is very pungent and, once you medicate with it, it leaves you wanting to just sit down and relax...‚Äù

‚ÄúHoly shnikees!  I love this stuff!,  As long as I don't have to function at all.  If you need something to take it ALL away go ahead and blaze up.  Probably some of the most mind-boggling weed I have ever smoked!‚Äù

‚ÄúThis is, by far, the best strain I have tried for pain. It takes a good ten minutes or so for the full effect to kick in but I am one happy girl right now. I have chronic pain and I haven't had this type of relief with any other strain or pharmaceutical for that matter. I can relax but I don't feel completely locked to the couch. Excellent strain! Smooth smoke, great for allday smoke. I usually keep some in my pocket to grind along with whatever...‚Äù

‚ÄúGrape Kryptonite packs a powerful punch. It has a fruity smell and taste, with purple colors. It comes on rather slowly and the effects include relaxation, elimination of stress, and some ease of pain. It has a nice balance to it, that you won't find in some strains that are heavy indicas or sativas.‚Äù
